text_block_list.text: When I was out with Matikanetannhauser and about to return to the academy—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-w-wait! Hold on going back! Today isn't over yet!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, since you're always taking care of me, Trainer, I thought I'd return the favor with some hospitality.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! And to make sure I can do it properly, I've invited an advisor too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Now then, here we go! Ta-da!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Hello, I'm Ikuno Dictus. I'll do my best to meet your expectations, so please take care of me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ikuno-sensei, thank you for today! Let's give Trainer the best hospitality!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Understood. I've prepared a 'hospitality' plan, so leave it to me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We're here! We're doing the 'hospitality' here, right!?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Yes. But before that, one thing about 'hospitality'—

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: First, what is 'hospitality'? The answer I've learned is, in a word, 'an act of empathizing with the other person's heart.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see, I see! And then, and then!?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: First, let's explore Trainer-san's preferences. Could you do some shopping freely?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's go find Trainer!
While under the intense gaze of the two, I'm looking around the store...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, how about that stuffed animal? Its eyes are sparkly! It has lots of legs too! It's perfect for Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: That's right, Tannhauser-san. Rushing is a no-no.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ikuno-sensei's hospitality class! Wait a sec, I'll take notes!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Ahem... Earlier, I said 'hospitality' is an act of empathizing with the heart.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: That's not limited to tastes and preferences. As a premise, creating a comfortable distance and pace is also important.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So... you're saying I shouldn't force it on them?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's right.
Let's proceed without forgetting the spirit of consideration.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa~! As expected of Ikuno-sensei!
I think I can do a perfect job of hospitality!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But there are so many important points, huh~.
Just taking notes is a real struggle...
No, maybe it's more like six struggles?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that okay?
Then, I'll be counting on you!

And the lecture continued, with Matikanetannhauser and
the two of us taking notes diligently...

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
--And that's about it.
This concludes the intermediate level of 'hospitality.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hospitality is really deep, huh!
My notes are packed full~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, thank you for helping with the notes.
With this, I can show 'hospitality' to you--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaahhhh!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I, I was trying to show hospitality to you, Trainer,
but I ended up getting help again...!?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
...Hah. Sorry!
I got too into it and ended up...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I meant to show hospitality,
but this is more like 'hospi-received'~!
choice_data_list: Just use it for the future!
You don't have to push yourself.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That's right!
I'll make sure to remember what I learned today!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Then, let me ask a question.
When showing 'hospitality,'
what must you not forget?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Umm, let's see...
Mem... mem... memory-making!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Close!
The correct answer is 'the spirit of consideration.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa~, it really is deep!
I'll study more--!

Matikanetannhauser was psyching herself up
for the next 'hospitality' challenge.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
You don't have to worry about me!
I'm not pushing myself at all!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Hmm... 'Don't push yourself'... does that mean 'It's better to be natural'?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see! Be natural! Naturally... shizen ni...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer... thank you as always...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, something's weird!? Am I always like this!?
And so, Matikanetannhauser ended the day with her awkward way of speaking...
